entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
